Html:
What exactly is the differance between the two?
I thought that one had to sign in to use a forum and not a blog, but it seems that is not the case here. They seem simliar to me.

Thanks

I plan on removing access to the forum as Blogs are the in-thing now.
It should be easy to remove access to forums by removing it from the menu.
Removing access to blogs could be a little more problematic because of the role bloggers.

The club kit when setup for a team would lean torwards blogs, the kit setup as a business may lean to forums.
They do appear to be redundant systems and I would not recommend using both unless you have a need.

Hotaling
I really don't think putting your blog posts in forums are really nice. I think it is kind of nice to have the separation.
